pkgmetadata.longdescription: Easily Extract Data from 'StatsWales' // Download data from 'StatsWales' into R. Removes the need for the user to write their own loops when parsing data from the 'StatsWales' API. Provides functions for datasets (http://open.statswales.gov.wales/en-gb/dataset) and metadata (http://open.statswales.gov.wales/en-gb/discover/metadata) endpoints.
